metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32981 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.18.3 on powerpc 32-bit platforms. There is a buffer overflow in ptrace PEEKUSER and POKEUSER (aka PEEKUSR and POKEUSR) when accessing floating point registers.

criterions.comment: linux-aws-5.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-aws-5.11').
